description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. 2D House of Terror is a Party Game which provides an enjoyable  4 Player experience. You and your friends can compete in random mode or witness the bewitching storyline  whilst taking on great challenges.  Young Billy O'Tale inherits a bunch of old things from his deceased greatuncle Willsworth, among them a mysterious treasure map! Together with his friends he sets off to start the adventure!
